title: Constructivist-Based Language Instructional Design: Application of Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of constructivist learning theory and basic instructional design principles
context.additional_context: A course where preservice teachers experience language education design applying constructivist principles in mobile environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply constructivist core principles (active learning, collaborative learning, authentic learning) to language instructional design
Learners can explain procedures for designing learner-driven knowledge construction activities in mobile microlearning environments
Learners can establish evaluation criteria centered on learner engagement and output when developing authentic language learning tasks
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
